creator: JaqerSoft
descriptionHtml:
We are pleased to offer Vietnamese Bible for your Android devices. Offered side by side with English version,utilizing the power of Android device for Vietnamese speaking community in Vietnam.

 A simple, yet a powerful design allows users to easily read the Bible.

FEATURES 
-Comes with Audio ( Requires internet connection and can download for offline listen) .
 -Comes with English version 
-Search function for easy navigation
 -Share your selected verse through Mail, SMS, Facebook 
-Choose from a different font size and background image

 It comes complete with New and Old testaments. Fast and easy to use.
Take your Bible with you wherever you go.

If the app infringe your copyright, please write email to me and we can remove the copyright content.
